page.title: 14OPINIONS ABOUT EAGLESHAM
page.content: problem.The three most widely held opinions were 1 the 24 who said,"Loss of green belts",2 the 21 who said" Traffic", 3 the 13 who said"Vandalism" There have been two public enquiries set up in the last decade as the result of local petitions which show the strength of local feeling.Both have been about proposed building in the green belt.There have also been public meetings and demonstrations about the large lorries coming through the village at high speed and to date two buildings and a bridge parapet have been seriously damaged as a result of a lorry crashing into them We asked the local policeman about crime in Eaglesham and found that in the past year 36 houses have been broken into and 5 people have been assaulted.
